mapper.select: select filter, question_no, member_id, order_no, title, type, contents, answer, reg_dt from(select rownum filter, question_no, member_id, order_no, title, type, contents, answer, reg_dt from question where title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' order by order_no) where filter between #{StartNum} and #{endNum}
select count(*) cnt from question where title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
